workLog.description: Fetched and analyzed Claude Code plugin marketplace documentation
workLog.outcome: Extracted marketplace schema, plugin sources, team configuration, caching behavior, and validation patterns

workLog.description: Fetched and analyzed Claude Code plugins creation guide
workLog.outcome: Documented plugin structure, components (skills, agents, hooks, MCP, LSP), and standalone vs plugin decision matrix
Wrote .agents/analysis/claude-code-plugin-marketplaces.md with full research, applicability assessment, and action items
Created 1 Serena memory (claude-code-plugin-marketplaces) and 8 Forgetful memories (IDs 467-474) with cross-links

decisions: Document plugin marketplace system as research for potential future adoption
Create atomic Forgetful memories covering each key concept independently
Identify project integration opportunities but defer implementation decision

learnings.insight: Plugin namespacing changes skill invocation from /skill to /plugin:skill, which is a breaking change for existing workflows
learnings.application: Factor namespace impact into any plugin migration decision for the ai-agents project
